name: Holly Jam Quest
description:
Touched by princess Zoey's story you make a vow to retrieve a legendary Holly Jam that was lost in the depths of Cursed Mountain. No one ever came back from there, but You, traveller, will succeed where other have fallen. Good Luck!!

What? Yes, legendary means just that. It's a legend. No one knows if it even exist. Go and make a name for yourself! Or something.
